sourcesContent: /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/img-redundant-alt */ import { Box, Button, Link, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import useMediaQuery from "@mui/material/useMediaQuery"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Main = () => { const { search } = useLocation(); const isWithImage = Boolean(new URLSearchParams(search).get("withImage")); const isMobile = useMediaQuery("(max-width:700px)"); return isMobile ? ( ONE TIME ONLY special price for 6 extra Clarifion for only{" "} $14 each ($84.00 total!) {isWithImage && ( )} Clarifion Air Ionizer $180 $84 12 left in Stock Simply plug a Clarifion into any standard outlet and replace bulky, expensive air purifiers with a simple. Negative Ion Technology may help with allergens Designed for air rejuvenation Perfect for every room in all types of places. Save 53% and get{" "} 6 extra Clarifision for only{" "} $14 Each. Free shipping Secure 256-bit SSL encryption. No thanks, I don’t want this. If you are not completely thrilled with your Clarifion - We have a{" "} 30 day satisfaction guarantee. Please refer to our return policy at the bottom of the page for more details. Happy Shopping! ) : ( “As soon as the Clarifions arrived I put one in my bedroom. This was late in the afternoon. When I went to the bedroom in the evening it smelled clean. When I went to bed I felt I could breathe better. Wonderful.” ONE TIME ONLY special price for 6 extra Clarifion for only $14 each ($84.00 total!) Clarifion Air Ionizer $180 $84 12 left in Stock Simply plug a Clarifion into any standard outlet and replace bulky, expensive air purifiers with a simple. Negative Ion Technology may{" "} help with allergens Designed for air rejuvenation Perfect for every room in all types of places. Save 53% and get 6 extra Clarifision for only $14 Each. Free shipping Secure 256-bit SSL encryption. No thanks, I don’t want this. If you are not completely thrilled with your Clarifion - We have a 30 day satisfaction guarantee. Please refer to our return policy at the bottom of the page for more details. Happy Shopping! ); }; export default Main;
